title: Understanding PivotTables
text: PivotTables in Excel are powerful tools for data analysis, but they don't automatically update when the source data changes. You need to refresh them manually.

title: How to Refresh a PivotTable
text: To update a PivotTable after changing the source data, right-click on the PivotTable and select 'Refresh'. This will update the table with the latest data.
